title: BIC announces winners of the 2021 Cristal Pen Awards
body_lines: At BIC, we have long advocated for improving lives through education; it is part of BIC’s DNA as we work to improve the learning conditions of 250 million children worldwide by 2025.

This year, in celebration of BIC Global Education Week, we once again launched the BIC Cristal Pen Awards. Selected from hundreds of nominations, 10 exceptional educators have been chosen as the winners. Each educator has shown tremendous dedication in preparing our next generation to thrive.

There has never been a more important time to support education. The ongoing pandemic continues to challenge educators as they’ve had to adapt to new ways of teaching, connecting, and supporting their students.   (BIC)
MiHCM & Tech One Global celebrate three years of partnership
